user.title: Provide serial port
user.description:
You can provide the device path or a [URL handler as supported by pyserial](https://pyserial.readthedocs.io/en/latest/url_handlers.html).
This can come in handy when addressing USB adapters by serial with `hwgrep://` or use `socket://ipaddress:50000` to access over network.
